original_text: He also made the table of acacia wood. Two cubits was its length, a cubit its breadth, and a cubit and a half its height.
korean_text: 그가 또 조각목으로 상을 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗, 너비가 한 규빗, 높이가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: He also made the table of acacia wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 아카시아 나무로 상을 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and a cubit and a half its height.
